channel.title: Comments on: Drey’s Top 10 Board Games
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: monica
item.dc:creator: monica
item.description: What happened to games like UNO and Clue? Sheesh, one of these days I'm actually going to play the games you have on the list and I'll know what you're talking about (I've lead a sheltered life;)
item.content:encoded: What happened to games like UNO and Clue? Sheesh, one of these days I’m actually going to play the games you have on the list and I’ll know what you’re talking about (I’ve lead a sheltered life;)
